name: Rush Rover
description: Rush Rover is a 2D top-down shooter game. Compared to other similar games of the genre, the shooting experience is closer to traditional shoot'em up games. It includes random map generation, unique weapons, lots of different enemies, exciting boss battles and a dynamic chiptune soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space
